duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain profitable relationships with key clients, underwriting U.S. Life and Health business, and working with clients and internal cross-functional teams as needed.
Gain and maintain knowledge of basic insurance products and concepts, as well as changes in both industry initiatives and principles of risk selection.
Assess data, medical, and financial documents to provide accurate and competitive facultative life risk selection while meeting communicated time service standards and production goals.
Contribute to testing activities, providing training and documentation to the wider underwriting department.
Support continuing education by regularly attending external and internal training programs, forums, meetings, and webinars.
Provide strategic support and handle projects and other responsibilities as determined.
Interact positively and effectively with staff, clients, and other divisions to allow efficient underwriting departmental operation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor, Master, or PhD degree with up to 3 years professional experience
